name: Your Balls: Basketball Game
description:
BEST BASKETBALL SHOOTING GAME!

Are you ready for the next generation basketball experience? We are here with a brand new basketball game where you can prove your basketball skills and challenge your opponents with your strategy intelligence.

**CHALLENGE YOUR OPPONENTS IN 1V1 ONLINE MATCHES! **
Show your strength against real players in this multiplayer Basketball game! Defeat your opponents in real-time tournaments, become a champion and earn rewards! It's up to you to be number 1!

**BUILD YOUR DECK TO THROW DOWN YOUR OPPONENTS**
In this stormy fight, you'll collect unique power cards and build your deck to increase your score while beating your opponent's ability down.

**PROGRESS IN YOUR CAREER ROAD**
Unlock unique and original arenas and courts that bring you glory and better prizes. The more matches you win, the more chances you have to progress through your basketball career.

** YOU WILL GO BEYOND THE AGE IN BASKETBALL! **
Shoot long 3-pointers, use special powers, win matches and win tournaments!

Features:
- All in real time with real players!
- Challenge your friends by linking your social media accounts!
- Unlock new courts and earn more gold
- Use your deck to boost your score
- Open reward boxes to collect more cards
- Progress in your career road
- Improve your card powers.
- Earn more trophies and climb to the top of the leaderboard.

*Free to Play
*Download Now!
